outcome:
ORDER

This is a petition filed under section 14 of the Securitization
and Reconstruction of Financial Assets and Enforcement of Security
Interest Act, 2002.

2. The petitioner filed an application seeking order
withdrawing the main petition. The application is allowed. The
petition is dismissed
full_text:
IN THE COURT OF THE CHIEF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present:
SUJA K.M
CHIEF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Wednesday, the 05th day of March, 2025
M.C. No.302/2025
Petitioner Central Bank of India, having its Regional Office at CSI
Building, 2" Floor, M.G.Road, Thiruvananthapuram -1, having
its branch office at VIJI/179.H, Chandavila, Punnamood,
Varkala, Thiruvananthapuram 695141, represented by its
Authorized Officer, Naresh Nedau, Chief Manager, Central
Bank of India, Kollam Branch, Thiruvananthapuram.
(By Adv.Smt.Reshmi S.R)
Respondents 1 Babu Surendran, aged 54 years, S/o surendran, Kuzhivila
Veedu, Punnamoodu, Varkala, Thiruvananthapuram 695141
2 Mini aged 48 years, D/o Surendran, Kuzhivila Veedu,
Punnamoodu, Varkala, Thiruvananthapuram 695141
ORDER

This is a petition filed under section 14 of the Securitization
and Reconstruction of Financial Assets and Enforcement of Security
Interest Act, 2002.

2. The petitioner filed an application seeking order
withdrawing the main petition. The application is allowed. The
petition is dismissed.

( Pronounced by me in open court on this the 05th day of March, 2025)
CHIEF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
